summary: Louisiana is a state in the southern United States. It is known for its unique culture, influenced by French, Spanish, and African traditions. The state has a diverse landscape, including coastal marshes, swamps, and forests. Louisiana was first claimed by the French in 1682 and later became part of New France. It changed hands between Spain and France before being sold to the United States in 1803. The capital is Baton Rouge, and New Orleans is its largest city. Louisiana has a rich history and is home to many Native American tribes.
title: Louisiana
